title: Capital market payments via UPI down 22%

The new system introduces a fund-blocking mechanism similar to ASBA.

title: ET poll: Economists predict RBI to hold policy rates steady amid economic uncertainty
summary: Economists anticipate the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) to maintain policy rates next week, despite potential for cuts, due to uncertainties from US tariffs and GST impacts. While some advocate for proactive rate cuts given low inflation, the majority prefers retaining options, awaiting clearer signs of economic slowdown and assessing the effects of recent GST reductions on inflation and growth.
